document_data.name: Akorstra
document_data.mainbody: '''Akorstra''' was a [[giant spider]] pet of the priestess of [[Lolth]] [[Vicala Szind]] during the 1480s [[DR]].{{DDO-time}}
document_data.Description: Akorstra had a gray-brown body and bright red feet.
document_data.History: During the [[Sschindylryn invasion of Eveningstar]], Akorstra joined its mistress Vicala on the attack on the [[Midler farmhouse]]. While Vicala interrogated the [[Midler]] family and [[Speitar Dun'Robar]] handled the troops, Akorstra lurked in the attic space waiting to ambush whoever came by.
